Class HDBManagerController

java.lang.Object
main.controller.HDBManagerController
public class HDBManagerController extends Object
Controller handling business logic for HDB Manager operations. Implements manager-specific use cases and coordinates between repositories. Uses project name as the unique project identifier.
Since:
2025-04-17
